00154     public:
00156         explicit by_distance_sorter() { }
00157 
00159         int operator()(const RODFRouteDesc& p1, const RODFRouteDesc& p2) {
00160             return p1.distance2Last < p2.distance2Last;
00161         }
00162     };

00167     public:

00172 
00174         bool operator()(const RODFRouteDesc& desc) {
00175             return myDesc.edges2Pass == desc.edges2Pass;
00176         }
